channel.title: Need Source Coding Help!
channel.description:
OK so I have seen in some servers you start of with a book that has like custom things in it that you can read like rules etc. can anyone show me how to make a custom book.
Also could you tell me how to add it in so when a character first logs in its automatically there without them haveing to type ::starter?
All help will be appreciated.

item.title: Need Source Coding Help!
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

Ohhh, do you know basic java??(making commands ect…) Becuase i havent made a server in so long that i kinda forgot the voids to help people, but all you need know is how to make something save, like pk points that way it only does it once. You would do make the points(try starter as the name to make it easyer for you) and when he logs in if starter equals 0, it gives him the items and sets it to 1, and next time he logs in it wont equal zero so using the ‘else’ statement it will just say welcome, if you dont know how to make pk points find a tut, becuase i dont want you to not learn anything, but i will give you the code. I just need to know if you know how to add points becuase i forgot -.-

Read full topic
